Author: Rivka90
Text: I feel the same. Feeling like her is why I left my kids with their dads. I just knew I was fucking them up more by being there than I would by leaving. Plus, my mom left me when I was a baby so I had to live out that storyline, apparently.

Author: slowtiger112
Text: Oh my god I read that book before sophomore year of high school and it fucked me up so bad. Iâ€™ve never been able to forget the weird and utter misery I felt when I read the last sentence. I cried after I finished it because I was both disturbed and weirdly comforted by how dark the book is.
